code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ProgressBar=_ref=>{let{percentage,label="Data Completion",showDetails=true}=_ref;const getStatusColor=percent=>{if(percent>=90)return'bg-latspace-dark';if(percent>=70)return'bg-latspace-medium';return'bg-latspace-light';};const getStatusText=percent=>{if(percent>=90)return'EXCELLENT';if(percent>=70)return'GOOD';return'NEEDS ATTENTION';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white border border-gray-200 p-grid-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between mb-grid-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-base font-semibold text-latspace-dark uppercase tracking-wide",children:label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-2xl font-mono text-latspace-dark data-value",children:[percentage.toFixed(0),"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-grid-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full bg-gray-100 h-grid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-grid transition-all duration-500 ".concat(getStatusColor(percentage)),style:{width:"".concat(percentage,"%")}})})}),showDetails&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs text-latspace-medium uppercase tracking-wider",children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs font-mono text-latspace-dark",children:getStatusText(percentage)})]})]});};
